message: Potatoes have what is commonly referred to as """"eyes"""" by potato farmers. There are dozens on each potato and each can be sliced out in a small wedge to produce a potato plant. Of course, I might be not seeing some factor that might make things different in growing them on Mars. Stick an organic potato in a warm, damp place and watch how many potato shoots start poking out of it.
shrinked_message: Potatoes have what is commonly referred to as """"eyes"""" by potato farmers. There are dozens on each potato and each can be sliced out in a small wedge to produce a potato plant.
